title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for downloading, running and chatting with 70+ open-source LLMs locally (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, Phi, …).

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client that wraps the Ollama REST API; sync & async support, streaming, embeddings, chat & generate.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; promises, streaming, chat, embeddings.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter giving ChatOllama, OllamaEmbeddings, OllamaFunctions, etc.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (like ChatGPT) that talks to local Ollama; multi-user, RAG, model manager, themes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions, Spring Boot starter and Maven Central release.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, embeddings, streaming.

title: ollama-cli-csharp
summary: .NET library and CLI for Ollama; supports DI, streaming, and Blazor sample.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder for production pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with multi-arch support and compose examples.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal Python RAG chatbot using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; 100 lines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models; slash commands & threads.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for private AI autocomplete & summarization via Ollama.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for JavaScript/TypeScript; 25k weekly downloads, zero runtime deps.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package; 120k monthly downloads, supports Python ≥3.8.

title: ollama-reddit discussion
summary: Community thread covering new tool-use beta, examples, and troubleshooting.
